title: "Cyborg Lines"
content:
# Welcome to Cyborg Lines

Cyborg Lines is a website dedicated to showcasing minimalist designs with a futuristic twist. Our main attraction is our striking wallpaper featuring a single line drawing of a cyborg in a bold color. 

But that's not all we have to offer. Our website features a curated collection of other minimalist wallpapers, all with a futuristic and sci-fi theme. We believe that less is more when it comes to design, and our collection reflects that philosophy.

In addition to our wallpapers, we also offer resources for designers and artists looking to create their own minimalist designs. From tutorials to inspiration galleries, we aim to be a one-stop-shop for all things minimalist and futuristic.

So whether you're looking to spice up your desktop background or expand your design skills, Cyborg Lines has something for you. Explore our collection today and join us in embracing the beauty of simplicity.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg, in a striking color such as bright red or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
